SHARED_KEY_CREATION.REQUIRED: Second Factor Authentication is required for your account. Please enable Second Factor Authentication to continue using LinShare.
SHARED_KEY_CREATION.INSTRUCTION: To enable Second Factor Authentication for your account:
SHARED_KEY_CREATION.STEP_1: Download and install the authentication app FreeOTP by scanning the QR code or following the links
